Process

Select the plan that works best for your needs

We’ll help determine your needs based on factors like company size, near-term growth goals, and budget. We will also discuss if you will be providing footage or need to schedule a shoot with our production team.

Schedule your strategy session

Each package comes with at least one strategy call with your project manager to strategize the most effective way to create and distribute your video content.

Chat with our team and submit requests via slack

During your onboarding process we will onboard you into our Slack channel. During business hours, you have on-demand access to our team to chat about your project and submit any requests.

We edit and bring your vision to reality!

Our team review all the notes from our strategy session to actualize your custom social media video content strategy to create social media content that works perfectly for your brand.

Review your content

You review your content and request any adjustments to your social media videos.

Download and enjoy your content!

Get to posting your video content and engaging with your audience! Please inquire with us if you have any social media management needs!
